text:
Hello. I got an Inbound Ticket from a colleague if someone is interested. Cheers, Thomas.
--> They are not available anymore.

Hey everyone! If you're attending INBOUND, you definitely don't want to miss the Developer Hug (<@UJAPS2K4N> <@UGDF9EBPW> <@UD53A9UUR>) joining forces with the CMS Hug (<@U03AKL6Q1B2>) to talk all things Dev at INBOUND tomorrow!!! <https://events.HubSpot.com/events/details/HubSpot-developer-presents-the-road-to-inbound24/cohost-developer|Sign up now>!
